categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Galaxies

nodes.text: Bowrun Stradalla was a male artisan who lived in the wilderness outside of Theed on Naboo during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was a leading crafter of musical instruments.

Dialogue pertaining to Bowrun Stradalla appeared in the directory tree files for the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. However, he never actually appeared on the video game's live servers as a proper non-player character.
